description:
It’s Christmas Eve tonight. There is a little party at Yuuto’s house, with Haruka and the Nogizaka family members. It’s the first informal house party for Haruka, and she is very excited. Mika and the others have a great time as well. In the midst of the excitement, Yuuto faints from overworking. The Nogizaka’s medic maid, Maria, comes to help, and tells Yuuto to stay in bed for the rest of the night. The party is over, but Haruka insists that she stays to take care of Yuuto. In the end, they end up spending the holy night by themselves…
Source: crunchyroll
